org.discobots.lib.motor

Class RampedMotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.discobots.lib.motor.RampedMotor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDOutput, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SpeedController

    public class RampedMotor
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SpeedController
    RampedMotor, based pretty heavily on FRC-pdr's ramped motor wrapper

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RampedMotor(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PWMSpeedController m, double rb)
      Creates a RampedMotor wrapper for motor m, with rampband rb, and scaling of 1

      Creates a RampedMotor wrapper for motor m, with rampband rb, and scaling of 1

      • RampedMotor

                   double rb)
        Creates a RampedMotor wrapper for motor m, with rampband rb, and scaling of 1
        Parameters:
        m - Any motor (e.g. Spark, Talon, etc.) that inherits PWMSpeedController
        rb - Rampband constant

        rb - Rampband constant
        sc - Scale constant
